author: Special Correspondent
text:
AIADMK general secretary Jayalalithaa on Friday appointed A.L. Pradeep as party’s Kerala secretary and effected some changes in Theni district.

In a statement, she said Andipatti MLA Thanga Tamilselvan had been appointed the district secretary of J. Jayalalithaa Peravai. After Finance Minister O. Panneerselvam, he is the known face of the party in the district. He had resigned as MLA of Andipatti constituency in 2001 enabling Ms. Jayalalithaa to contest in a by-election and become Chief Minister again.

According to party sources, he was sidelined in the party for a while for openly confronting Mr. Panneerselvam, but has been rehabilitated ahead of the elections.

She replaced R.R. Jagadeesh with M. Selvam as Theni district students’ wing secretary. In another change, M. Rajkumar was appointed the district secretary of MGR youth wing. M. Mani was appointed the joint secretary of Ilaignar Pasarai and Ilam Pengal Pasarai.

In South Chennai (south) district, M.M. Babu was relieved from the post of district secretary and replaced with Virugai V.N. Ravi.

Ms. Jayalalithaa appointed Srinivasan Venugopal as State party treasurer and Dr. SBS. Basheer secretary of minority wing in Kerala. She appointed J. Satishkumar as Trivandrum district secretary of J. Jayalalithaa Peravai, C. Abdul Khader as Idukki district secretary of the Peravai and I. Rajappan as Anna Tozhir Sangam secretary in Idukki district.
title: Jayalalithaa effects changes on OPS’ home turf
